channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 50 years after the birth of special education, some fear for its future under Trump
item.description: The Trump administration has fired, or tried to fire, many of the federal staff who manage and enforce federal disability law in schools.

item.title: Belgium rejects EU plan to use frozen Russian assets for Ukraine
item.description: Belgium on Wednesday rejected a plan to use frozen Russian assets to help prop up Ukraine's economy and war effort over the next two years, saying tha...

item.title: The Hong Kong Fire: A Crisis in the National Security Era
item.description: The authorities quickly arrested critics demanding accountability, signaling an expansive use of the security law to silence dissent over nonpolitical...

item.title: A Palestinian convicted in bombing plot is now an award-winning novelist, and free
item.description: Bassem Khandaqji entered prison 21 years ago for plotting a deadly bombing in Israel. He left prison as an award-winning novelist.

item.title: Visiting Turkey and Lebanon, Pope Leo Echoed Francis’s Message, Not His Style
item.description: Traveling through the Mideast, Leo XIV channeled many of his predecessor’s messages. Leo’s deliberate manner differed from Francis.

item.title: Democrats seek limits on who can serve as immigration judges amid mass layoffs
item.description: The legislation comes after the White House authorized up to 600 military lawyers to be temporary immigration judges and scrapped requirements for the...

item.title: The use and misuse of the word 'ideology'
item.description: The word "ideology" has become a fixture in American political rhetoric, invoked by leaders to cast opponents' beliefs as dangerous, stupid or unfound...

item.title: Storm Floodwaters in Indonesia Turned Logs Into Floating Projectiles
item.description: Many logs became forces of destruction in Indonesia last week, in a sign that deforestation compounded the devastation wrought by a cyclone.

item.title: Inside Venezuela
item.description: We explain how President Nicolás Maduro is responding to threats from the Trump administration.

item.title: Trump’s Xenophobic Outburst, and a Planned Donation to 25 Million U.S. Kids
item.description: Plus, the 10 best books of the year.
